title: Character Creation
content:
Character Creation in Baldur's Gate 3 covers information regarding the customization mechanic for creating a character. The customization may allow you to freely choose the appearance of your character, from selecting the gender, and race, to choosing various parts of the facial structure, body appearance, and many more.

Character Customization in Baldur's Gate 3 expands beyond simple aesthetic choices but creates the personality and the core of the character which will in turn affect the game.
